parse.title: List of group-0 ISBN publisher codes

text.*:
See also: List of group-1 ISBN publisher codes
This article needs additional citations for verification. Please help improve this article by adding citations to reliable sources. Unsourced material may be challenged and removed. (March 2013) (Learn how and when to remove this template message)

A list of publisher codes for (978) International Standard Book Numbers with a group code of zero.

The group-0 publisher codes are assigned as follows:

Publisher number Item number Group identifier Total possible books
From To Number of possible publisher codes Books per publisher
2 digits 6 digits 0-00-xxxxxx-x 0-19-xxxxxx-x 20 1,000,000 20,000,000
3 digits 5 digits 0-200-xxxxx-x 0-699-xxxxx-x 500 100,000 50,000,000
4 digits 4 digits 0-7000-xxxx-x 0-8499-xxxx-x 1,500 10,000 15,000,000
5 digits 3 digits 0-85000-xxx-x 0-89999-xxx-x 5,000 1,000 5,000,000
6 digits 2 digits 0-900000-xx-x 0-949999-xx-x 50,000 100 5,000,000
7 digits 1 digit 0-9500000-x-x 0-9999999-x-x 500,000 10 5,000,000
Total Possible Group-0 Codes: 557,020 -- 100,000,000

Contents

  • 1 2-digit publisher codes (00–19)
  • 2 3-digit publisher codes (200–699)
  • 3 4-digit publisher codes (7000–8499)
  • 4 5-digit publisher codes (85000–89999)
  • 5 6-digit publisher codes (900000–949999)
  • 6 7-digit publisher codes (9500000–9999999)
  • 7 See also
  • 8 References
  • 9 External links
